PharmacyTypeCS CodeSystem

Types of Pharmacies. Each payer will have its own controlled vocabulary.

name: PharmacyTypeCS
title: PharmacyTypeCS
description: Types of Pharmacies. Each payer will have its own controlled vocabulary.

concept.definition: 1 Month Supply via in-network retail pharmacy.
1 Month Supply via out-of-network retail pharmacy.
1 Month Supply via in-network mail order pharmacy.
1 Month Supply via out-of-network mail order pharmacy.
3 Month Supply via in-network retail pharmacy.
